WorkItem.ClosedComment:
https://kerbaldata.codeplex.com/SourceControl/changeset/e40f7b4e569c

Updated to add at minimum top level access for all major types.
WorkItem.Description:
0.1.5 has some basic wiring for key elements most developers would be interested in right away. 

Fully "flesh-out" high level object structure to include easy access with as few lines for code possible to the following:

* Crew
* Game Parameters
* Parts
* Craft Files
* Game Configuration

Comments.Message:
Adding all save models. Including type conversion where sensible. For example, anywhere time is presented both the raw decimal value and a TimeSpan instance are available as properties on the model object. 

Due to floating point issues time calculations using TimeSpan seem to be about 5-20 mins off from game time.
added data loading system and wired up primary top level classes.
All top level except game scenarios have been exposed.
